text: Di godou madagoaa hua dela ma ga longono goodou nia hagadilinga lee labaa, mee ngiingii iliili, ‘zither’, ‘lyre’, ‘harp’ mo ‘pipe’, nomuli gei nia hagadilinga mee ala i golo ala ga nnoo aga nadau lee. Di madagoaa hua dela ga daamada ai di gatangi deelaa, gei goodou la gi pala gi lala, daumaha ang gi di ada dangada goolo a King Nebuchadnezzar dela ne haga duu aga.
